sections.heading: Petition; filing; contents.When a petition is filed with the county clerk signed by persons owning not less than twenty-five percent of the area in the proposed district requesting the formation of a district, the governing body of the county in which the proposed district is located shall prepare a
sections.text: Petition; filing; contents.When a petition is filed with the county clerk signed by persons owning not less than twenty-five percent of the area in the proposed district requesting the formation of a district, the governing body of the county in which the proposed district is located shall prepare and propose the resolution as provided in section 39-1639. The petition shall state the improvements desired and the property to be included in the district.SourceLaws 1963, c. 213, ยง 3, p. 681.
